description.p: Sir (Simple Image Resizer) is a utility to resize one or many images at a time. Sir allows you to select a number of images (or a whole directory), to import then once you have chosen the size that you want to export to, will export them in one action. Sir also has the ability to resize while preserving the aspect ratio, and do simple transforms like rotation. Sir supports over 30 different image formats for import and output, including PNG, JPG, BMP, SVG and TIFF.
